definitions.definition: (of a person) tending to show feelings, especially of affection, openly.
examples: expressive, open, forthcoming, communicative, unreserved, emotional, effusive, gushing; Moreaffectionate, cuddly, loving, warm, friendly, approachable; informaltouchy-feely, lovey-dovey, huggy "a very demonstrative family"Moreaffectionate, cuddly, loving, warm, friendly, approachable; touchy-feely, lovey-dovey, huggy a very demonstrative family

definitions.definition: serving as conclusive evidence of something; giving proof.
synonyms: illustrative More"the successes are demonstrative of their skill"convincing

definitions.definition: involving demonstration, especially by scientific means.
examples: the possibility of a demonstrative science of ethics

definitions.definition: (of a determiner or pronoun) indicating the person or thing referred to (e.g., this, that, those ).
